Defined class LookUpTable with attribute(s). Created lookup table class with support for encoding/decoding.

class codecipher.vigenere.lookup_table.LookUpTable[source]

Bases: object

Defined class LookUpTable with attribute(s) and method(s). Created lookup table class with support for encoding/decoding. It defines:

attributes
ALPHA - Define alphabet for encoding/decoding.
NUM - Defined numeric for encoding/decoding.
WHITE_SPACE - Defined white space for encoding/decoding.
ALPHANUM - Aggregated chars for encoding/decoding.
LETTER_TO_INDEX - Indexed letters for encoding/decoding.
INDEX_TO_LETTER - Indexed letters for encoding/decoding.
methods
None

ALPHANUM = 'abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ0123456789 '
